meanings.definition: A type of grass commonly used on golf courses.
meanings.sent1: The golf course was covered in lush bentgrass.
meanings.sent2: The maintenance crew planted bentgrass on the fairway.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn in the bentgrass.
meanings.sent4: The bentgrass spread across the field like a soft green carpet.
meanings.sent5: The bentgrass swayed gently in the breeze, inviting golfers to play.

meanings.definition: A grass with fine leaves and creeping stems.
meanings.sent1: The bentgrass in the garden had delicate leaves.
meanings.sent2: The bentgrass slowly covered the ground with its thin stems.
meanings.sent3: The curious rabbit nibbled on the bentgrass, savoring its tender texture.
meanings.sent4: The bentgrass snuck through the cracks in the pavement like a green serpent.
meanings.sent5: The bentgrass tickled the toes of the children as they ran through the park.

meanings.definition: A grass that is often used for putting greens.
meanings.sent1: The golfer carefully lined up his shot on the bentgrass putting green.
meanings.sent2: The maintenance crew mowed the bentgrass on the putting green to perfection.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous goose waddled onto the putting green and pecked at the bentgrass.
meanings.sent4: The bentgrass on the putting green was as smooth as a polished marble floor.
meanings.sent5: The bentgrass on the putting green gleamed under the bright sun, beckoning players to aim true.
